name: Aboard The Ship
description:
A Game about walking around a small place and talking to some people.

I made this in one night so the entire thing is very small.

Contains:

-9 npcs with their little dialogue.

-2 or 3 endings that make too much sense or are just really dumb.

-graphics that are weird and cool.

-an amazing number of 5 minutes of gameplay!

-and a good night well spent!
